card.name: "A Poet That Knows It"
card.text: Whenever "A Poet That Knows It" attacks, you may pay 2 life. If you do, it gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: "Academic Debate"
card.text: Target creature blocks this turn if able. You may have that creature gain reach until end of turn. Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

card.name: "Approach of the Dragon"
card.text: "Approach of the Dragon" deals 3 damage to each opponent. Then you may exile "Approach of the Dragon" and four other cards named "Approach of the Dragon" from your graveyard. If you do, search your library for a Dragon creature card, put it into the battlefield, then shuffle. A deck can have any number of cards named "Approach of the Dragon".

card.name: "Conspiracy Theorist"
card.text: Whenever "Conspiracy Theorist" attacks, you may pay {1} and discard a card. If you do, draw a card. Whenever you discard one or more nonland cards, you may exile one of them. If you do, you may cast that card this turn.

card.name: "Conspiracy Theorist"
card.text: Whenever "Conspiracy Theorist" attacks, you may pay {1} and discard a card. If you do, draw a card. Whenever you discard one or more nonland cards, you may exile one of them. If you do, you may cast that card this turn.

card.name: "Deep Disappointment"
card.text: Each player loses 2 life. You draw two cards.

card.name: "Elemental Calling"
card.text: Create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.

card.name: "Eyebat"
card.text: Flying When "Eyebat" dies, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

card.name: "Forum Mooderator"
card.text: Whenever "Forum Mooderator" attacks, you may put an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to the bottom of your library. If you do, exile top two cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play those cards.

card.name: "Frog Fractals"
card.text: Create a 0/0 blue and green Fractal creature token and put X +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: "Geist Commander"
card.text: {T}: Attacking Spirits you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: "Hungry Chomp Rider"
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: "I Have a Dragon and Dragon Says 'No'. Do You Have a Dragon? Didn't Think So"
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. "I Have a Dragon and Dragon Says 'No'. Do You Have a Dragon? Didn't Think So" deals X damage to each non-Dragon creature, where X is the mana value of the exiled card. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead. Exile "I Have a Dragon and Dragon Says 'No'. Do You Have a Dragon? Didn't Think So".

card.name: "Malestrom Muse"
card.text: Flying Whenever "Malestrom Muse" attacks, the next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn costs {X} less to cast, where X is "Malestrom Muse"'s power as this ability resolves.

card.name: "Master of Minecraft"
card.text: Reach Whenever a creature you control with power equal to its toughness attacks, it gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: "Nightmare's Beverage"
card.text: You gain 2 life. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.

card.name: "Oggyar Battle Seer"
card.text: Haste {T}: Scry 1.

card.name: "Sinister Domain"
card.text: You may pay {1}{B} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. If the {1}{B} cost was paid, an opponent draws a card. Exile target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: "Sublime Rehearsal"
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, put one of them on the bottom of your library, then exile the rest. Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled this way.

card.name: "Tiger Surfer"
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, until end of turn, target creature you control gains "When this creature leaves the battlefield, exile it instead" and "When this creature is exiled, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token."

card.name: "We'll Do It Live!"
card.text: Choose one — • "We'll Do It Live!" deals 1 damage to any target. • Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Academic Probation
card.text: Choose one — • Choose a nonland card name. Opponents can't cast spells with the chosen name until your next turn. • Choose target nonland permanent. Until your next turn, it can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

card.text: Attacking creatures you control have double strike.

card.text: Attacking creatures you control have double strike.

card.text: When Campus Guide enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

card.name: Clever Lumimancer
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Clever Lumimancer gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Codie, Vociferous Codex
card.text: You can't cast permanent spells. {4}, {T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. When you cast your next spell this turn, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile an instant or sorcery card with lesser mana value. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put each other card exiled this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Combat Professor
card.text: Flying At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Confront the Past
card.text: Choose one — • Return target planeswalker card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. • Remove twice X loyalty counters from target planeswalker an opponent controls.

card.name: Culmination of Studies
card.text: Exile the top X cards of your library. For each land card exiled this way, create a Treasure token. For each blue card exiled this way, draw a card. For each red card exiled this way, Culmination of Studies deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Curate
card.text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order. Draw a card.

card.name: Defend the Campus

card.text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Tanazir Quandrix
card.text: Flying, trample When Tanazir Quandrix enters the battlefield, double the number of +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. Whenever Tanazir Quandrix attacks, you may have the base power and toughness of other creatures you control become equal to Tanazir Quandrix's power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Teachings of the Archaics
card.text: If an opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw two cards. Draw three cards instead if an opponent has at least four more cards in hand than you.

card.name: Thrilling Discovery
card.text: You gain 2 life. Then you may discard two cards. If you do, draw three cards.

card.name: Thunderous Orator
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Thunderous Orator attacks, it gains flying until end of turn if you control a creature with flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, indestructible, lifelink, menace, and trample.

card.name: Uvilda, Dean of Perfection // Nassari, Dean of Expression
card.type: Legendary Creature - Djinn Wizard // Legendary Creature - Efreet Shaman

card.name: Uvilda, Dean of Perfection // Nassari, Dean of Expression
card.type: Legendary Creature - Djinn Wizard // Legendary Creature - Efreet Shaman

card.name: Valentin, Dean of the Vein // Lisette, Dean of the Root
card.type: Legendary Creature - Vampire Warlock // Legendary Creature - Human Druid

card.name: Valentin, Dean of the Vein // Lisette, Dean of the Root
card.type: Legendary Creature - Vampire Warlock // Legendary Creature - Human Druid

card.name: Velomachus Lorehold
card.text: Flying, vigilance, haste Whenever Velomachus Lorehold attacks, look at the top seven cards of your library. You may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value less than or equal to Velomachus Lorehold's power from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Venerable Warsinger
card.text: Vigilance, trample Whenever Venerable Warsinger deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the amount of damage Venerable Warsinger dealt to that player.

card.name: Verdant Mastery
card.text: You may pay {3}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Search your library for up to four basic land cards and reveal them. Put one of them onto the battlefield tapped under an opponent's control if the {3}{G} cost was paid. Put two of them onto the battlefield tapped under your control and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Vineglimmer Snarl
card.text: As Vineglimmer Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Forest or Island card from your hand. If you don't, Vineglimmer Snarl enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

card.name: Vineglimmer Snarl
card.text: As Vineglimmer Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Forest or Island card from your hand. If you don't, Vineglimmer Snarl enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

card.name: Waterfall Aerialist
card.text: Flying Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)

card.name: Witherbloom Apprentice
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Witherbloom Command
card.text: Choose two — • Target player mills three cards, then you return a land card from your graveyard to your hand. • Destroy target noncreature, nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less. • Target creature gets -3/-1 until end of turn. • Target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Witherbloom Command
card.text: Choose two — • Target player mills three cards, then you return a land card from your graveyard to your hand. • Destroy target noncreature, nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less. • Target creature gets -3/-1 until end of turn. • Target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
